column4: I installed feisty fawn yesterday evening on my notebook and the sound playback worked flawlessly. Today, I started the notebook again and I can't hear a thing. I checked alsamixer, everything is set to the highest level. What else can it be?
try sudo aplay /dev/urandom... do you hear any static?
nope, no static
try sudo esd, do you hear anything?
nope, no sound/static.
then you probably have something muted, or its a hardware problem... pastebin the output of 'amixer'
suspend/hibernate might cause some things to mute after a driver startup issue
something weird in the amixer output?
i just got it 1 sec
no looks ok
try sudo /etc/init.d/alsautils restart
try sudo /etc/init.d/alsa-utils restart
no static with aplay /dev/urandom
can I somehow reinstall the whole sound subsystem?
i don't think that would do anything, plus don't know how
okay.
are you sure its not a hardware issue?
I'm thinking about it but.... I might try the live cd, check if there is sound
I will be back in about 10 minutes I think ;)
no sound in the live CD either
it's just so weird will a couple hours ago, I was using my notebook and I had sound.
